content: classic ribbed hat by vanessa bodrie this wonderfully stretchy hat is warm and cozy and fits a wide variety of head sizes yarn worsted or aran weight yarn needles us 9 circular 16 length and us 9 double points notions tapestry needle and one marker gauge 20 stitches = 4 in stockinette stitch finished size teen/adult hat approx 23 circumference when stretched abbreviations k2tog - knit two stitches together sts - stitches pm - place marker instructions cast on 108 stitches pm join in the round being careful not to twist k2 p2 around until hat measures 10 or desired finished length minus 1 decrease for top 1 k2 p1 k2tog k1 p1 until 1 stitch remains slip remaining stitch onto left needle and k2tog you will reposition the marker so it sits after the k2tog 2 work sts as they appear 3 k1 k2tog k1 until 2sts remain k2tog 54 sts 4 transfer stitches evenly to three double pointed needles you will have 18sts on each needle 5 work sts as they appear 6 k2tog around 27sts 7 k around 8 k1 k2tog around 14sts 9 k2tog around 7sts finishing cut yarn leaving 6 tail using a tapestry needle pull yarn through the remaining 7 stitches darn in ends give your hat a little bath and air dry
